channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Letitia James pleads not guilty on federal bank fraud charges
item.description: New York Attorney General Letitia James pleaded not guilty on Friday morning to federal bank fraud charges . Why it matters: President Trump publicly ...

item.title: Exclusive: USDA says it won't use emergency funds for food stamps
item.description: The Agriculture Department says it can't use contingency funds to pay for food stamps during the government shutdown — and that states won't be reimbu...

item.title: "Not a serious question": Jeffries dismisses report of potential primary challenge
item.description: House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries (D-N.Y.) on Friday shrugged off Axios' reporting that New York City Council member Chi Ossé is considering a pri...

item.title: Civilian employees at several federal agencies miss their first full paycheck
item.description: Data: Bipartisan Policy Center; Note: Military includes 50% of reservists and National Guard due to payment schedule. Excludes 70,000 DHS personnel fo...

item.title: House lawmakers have met and voted just 87 days so far in 2025
item.description: Data: House Clerk; Chart: Jacque Schrag/Axios House lawmakers have met and voted just 87 days so far in 2025, fewer than every non-election year over ...

item.title: With East Wing gone, questions now turn to Trump’s ballroom donors
item.description: Ethics experts and Democrats say they are eager to know whether the private donors behind the planned $300 million ballroom are poised to receive any ...

item.title: Letitia James pleads not guilty in mortgage case Trump pushed
item.description: New York Attorney General Letitia James’s attorneys said they’ll seek to disqualify Lindsey Halligan, the interim U.S. attorney who has brought charge...

item.title: Pentagon to use $130 million anonymous donation to help pay troops
item.description: The amount is less than a day’s worth of salaries. Fiscal policy experts say the move also raises legal questions.

item.title: Pentagon orders aircraft carrier to Latin America as Trump signals escalation
item.description: A spokesman said the dramatic increase in combat power aims not only to “disrupt narcotics trafficking” in the region but to “degrade and dismantle” t...

item.title: House Minority Leader Jeffries endorses Zohran Mamdani
item.description: Jeffries, who represents a Brooklyn district, had faced questions for months over why he hadn’t endorsed Mamdani in the New York City mayoral race.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
